local_schema.longdesc: A partial GStreamer pipeline to use for this profile.

local_schema.short_desc: A short name for the audio profile
local_schema.longdesc: A short name for the audio profile, to be used in selections and uniquely identifying the profile.

local_schema.short_desc: The default file extension for this profile
local_schema.longdesc: A filename extension to be used when storing files encoded with this profile.

local_schema.short_desc: A description for the audio profile
local_schema.longdesc: A description of the profile, containing more information and describing when to use this profile.

local_schema.short_desc: Whether this profile is to be used
local_schema.longdesc: Whether to use and display this profile.
